E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 4/12/1985
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Gerald Toothman
in return for
2B Angelo Planas, 3B Kenneth Trautman, SP Thomas Wilkins.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Plum Grove GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Alberto Deles
Dear Sir,
Alberto Deles has problems at AA !
He has an ERA of 5.18, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Thomas Wilkins
Dear Sir,
Thomas Wilkins has an ERA of 3.03 at A !
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 5/23/1985
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Tanner Boyle

Your scouting director
